english.segment1: Let the poor man say, "i am rich in him.". Let the lost man say, "i am found in him.". Let the river flow.
english.segment2: Let the blind man say, "i can see again.". Let the dead man say, "i am born again.". Let the river flow, let the river flow.
english.segment3: Chorus. Let the river flow, let the river flow;. Holy spirit come, move in power. Let the river flow, let the river flow;. Holy spirit come, move in power. Let the river flow, let the river flow, Let the river flow.
